mapper.select:
WITH OG_PRTNR_WARE_INF AS ( /* 조직 및 창고 */ SELECT O1.BASE_YM , O1.OG_ID , O1.OG_TP_CD , O1.OG_CD , O1.OG_NM , O1.BLD_CD , O1.BLD_NM , (CASE WHEN O1.OG_TP_CD IN ('W02', 'W03') THEN DGR1_LEVL_OG_ID WHEN O1.OG_TP_CD IN ('W06') THEN '71314' ELSE O1.OG_ID END) AS L1_HGR_OG_ID , (CASE WHEN O1.OG_TP_CD IN ('W02', 'W03') THEN DGR2_LEVL_OG_ID ELSE O1.OG_ID END) AS L2_HGR_OG_ID , (CASE WHEN O1.OG_TP_CD IN ('W02', 'W03') THEN DGR3_LEVL_OG_ID ELSE O1.OG_ID END) AS L3_HGR_OG_ID , (CASE WHEN O1.OG_TP_CD IN ('W02', 'W03') THEN DGR1_LEVL_OG_CD WHEN O1.OG_TP_CD IN ('W06') THEN '71314' ELSE O1.OG_CD END) AS L1_HGR_OG_CD , (CASE WHEN O1.OG_TP_CD IN ('W02', 'W03') THEN DGR2_LEVL_OG_CD ELSE O1.OG_CD END) AS L2_HGR_OG_CD , (CASE WHEN O1.OG_TP_CD IN ('W02', 'W03') THEN DGR3_LEVL_OG_CD ELSE O1.OG_CD END) AS L3_HGR_OG_CD , (CASE WHEN O1.OG_TP_CD IN ('W02', 'W03') THEN DGR1_LEVL_OG_NM WHEN O1.OG_TP_CD IN ('W06') THEN 'Wells CS운영팀' ELSE O1.OG_NM END) AS L1_HGR_OG_NM , (CASE WHEN O1.OG_TP_CD IN ('W02', 'W03') THEN DGR2_LEVL_OG_NM ELSE O1.OG_NM END) AS L2_HGR_OG_NM , (CASE WHEN O1.OG_TP_CD IN ('W02', 'W03') THEN DGR3_LEVL_OG_NM ELSE O1.OG_NM END) AS L3_HGR_OG_NM , O1.HGR_OG_ID , S1.WARE_NO , S1.WARE_NM , S1.WARE_USE_YN , S1.WARE_MNGT_PRTNR_NO , S1.WARE_DTL_DV_CD , S1.HGR_WARE_NO , S1.STD_WARE_USE_YN , O2.PRTNR_NO , O2.PRTNR_KNM , O2.FST_CNTR_DT /*최초계약일자*/ , O2.FNL_CLTN_DT /*최종해약일자*/ , O2.RCNTR_DT /*재계약일자*/ , O2.CLTN_DT /*해약일자*/ , O2.CNTR_DT /*계약일자*/ , O2.HIR_FOM_CD /*고용형태코드,1 사업자, 2 계약직,3 정규직, 4 법인영업수수료대상 , 5 강사, 9 기타(위탁)*/ , O2.BZ_STAT_CD /*사업상태코드, 1 사업, 2 해약, 3 휴업*/ , O2.PSTN_DV_CD /*직급구분코드*/ , O2.RSB_DV_CD /*직책구분코드*/ , F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'RSB_DV_CD', O2.RSB_DV_CD, 'ko') AS RSB_DV_CD_NM , O2.ROL_DV_CD /*직무구분코드*/ , O2.PRTNR_GD_CD /*파트너등급코드*/ , O2.QLF_DV_CD /*자격구분코드*/ , F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'QLF_DV_CD', O2.QLF_DV_CD, 'ko') AS QLF_DV_NM , O2.PERF_EXCD_OJ_YN /*실적제외대상여부*/ , O2.RDS_DSB_EXCD_OJ_YN /*RDS지급제외대상여부*/ , O3.PRTNR_GD_CD AS ENG_PRTNR_GD_CD /*파트너등급코드*/ , COUNT(1) OVER (PARTITION BY HGR_OG_ID ORDER BY HGR_OG_ID) AS HTR_CNT FROM TB_OGBS_MM_OG_IZ O1 /*월조직내역*/ LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SVST_MCBY_WARE_IZ S1 /*월별창고내역*/ ON O1.BASE_YM = S1.APY_YM AND O1.OG_TP_CD = S1.OG_TP_CD AND O1.OG_ID = S1.OG_ID AND S1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OGBS_MM_PRTNR_IZ O2 /*월파트너내역*/ ON S1.APY_YM = O2.BASE_YM AND S1.OG_TP_CD = O2.OG_TP_CD AND S1.OG_ID = O2.OG_ID AND S1.WARE_MNGT_PRTNR_NO = O2.PRTNR_NO
AND O2.CLTN_DT IS NULL /* 퇴사자 제외 */
LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OGPS_EGER_GD_RGST_IZ O3 /*엔지니어등급등록내역*/ ON O3.OG_TP_CD = O2.OG_TP_CD AND O3.PRTNR_NO = O2.PRTNR_NO AND O3.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND #{baseYm} || '01' BETWEEN O3.APY_STRTDT AND O3.APY_ENDDT AND O3.APY_SEQN = ( SELECT MAX(APY_SEQN) AS APY_SEQ FROM TB_OGPS_EGER_GD_RGST_IZ WHERE 1=1 AND OG_TP_CD = O3.OG_TP_CD AND PRTNR_NO = O3.PRTNR_NO AND #{baseYm} || '01' BETWEEN APY_STRTDT AND APY_ENDDT AND DTA_DL_YN = 'N') WHERE 1 = 1 AND O1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND S1.WARE_USE_YN = 'Y' AND S1.WARE_DTL_DV_CD NOT LIKE '%0' AND O1.BASE_YM = LEAST(#{baseYm}, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMM')) /* 조직 검색조건 */
AND O1.OG_TP_CD IN ('W02') /* 매니저 */
AND O1.OG_TP_CD IN ('W03','W06') /* 엔지니어 */
AND O1.OG_TP_CD IN ('W02', 'W03', 'W06') /* 전체 (매니저,엔지니어) */
AND (CASE WHEN O1.OG_TP_CD IN ('W02', 'W03') THEN DGR1_LEVL_OG_ID WHEN O1.OG_TP_CD IN ('W06') THEN '71314' ELSE O1.OG_ID END) = #{dgr1LevlOgId}
AND (CASE WHEN O1.OG_TP_CD IN ('W02', 'W03') THEN DGR2_LEVL_OG_ID ELSE O1.OG_ID END) = #{dgr2LevlOgId}
AND (CASE WHEN O1.OG_TP_CD IN ('W02', 'W03') THEN DGR3_LEVL_OG_ID ELSE O1.OG_ID END) = #{dgr3LevlOgId}
AND (CASE WHEN O1.OG_TP_CD IN ('W02', 'W03') THEN DGR3_LEVL_OG_ID ELSE O1.OG_ID END) = #{ogId} /* 서비스센터 */
AND O2.PRTNR_NO = #{prtnrNo} /* 엔지니어/매니저 파트너번호 */
ORDER BY O1.BASE_YM, O1.OG_CD ) SELECT V1.* FROM ( SELECT O1.L1_HGR_OG_CD AS DGR1_LEVL_OG_CD /*총괄단코드*/ , O1.L1_HGR_OG_NM AS DGR1_LEVL_OG_NM /*총괄단명*/ , O1.L2_HGR_OG_CD AS DGR2_LEVL_OG_CD /*지역단코드*/ , O1.L2_HGR_OG_NM AS DGR2_LEVL_OG_NM /*지역단명*/ , O1.L3_HGR_OG_CD AS DGR3_LEVL_OG_CD /*지점코드*/ , O1.L3_HGR_OG_NM AS DGR3_LEVL_OG_NM /*지점명*/ , O1.PRTNR_NO /*파트너번호*/ , O1.PRTNR_KNM /*파트너명*/ , O1.BLD_CD /*빌딩코드*/ , O1.BLD_NM /*빌딩명*/ , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(C1.IST_DT ),'YYYY-MM-DD') AS IST_DT , S1.CNTR_NO , S1.CNTR_SN , C5.RCGVP_KNM /*설치고객명*/ , S1.PD_CD /*접수시 제품코드*/ , P1.PD_ABBR_NM AS PD_NM /*접수시 제품명*/ , TO_NUMBER(P1.SAP_MAT_CD) AS SAP_MAT_CD /*SAP코드*/ , C4.CNTR_ADRPC_ID /*계약주소지ID*/ , C4.ADRPC_TP_CD /*계약주소지ID : 1 계약주소, 2 배달주소, 3 설치주소*/ , C5.ADR_ID /*주소ID*/ , S1.ADR_ID AS RCT_ADR_ID /*접수시 주소ID*/ , C5.ADR_DV_CD /*주소구분코드 : 1 도로명, 2 지번*/ , G1.NEW_ADR_ZIP /*신주소우편번호*/ , G1.RNADR /*도로명주소*/ , G1.RDADR /*도로명상세주소*/ , C5.CRAL_LOCARA_TNO /*휴대지역전화번호*/ , C5.MEXNO_ENCR /*휴대전화국번호암호화*/ , C5.CRAL_IDV_TNO /*휴대개별전화번호*/ , C5.LOCARA_TNO /*지역전화번호*/ , C5.EXNO_ENCR /*전화국번호암호화*/ , C5.IDV_TNO /*개별전화번호*/ , (CASE WHEN CC1.AS_ASK_CN IS NOT NULL THEN CC1.AS_ASK_CN ELSE S1.CNSL_MO_CN END) AS AS_ASK_CN /*AS요청내용*/ , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(S1.RCPDT),'YYYY-MM-DD') AS RCP_DT /*접수일자*/ , O1.PRTNR_KNM AS RCP_PRTNR_KNM /*접수자성명*/ , S1.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD /*접수업무유형코드*/ , F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD', S1.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD, 'ko') AS SV_BIZ_DCLSF_NM /*업무유형명*/ , (CASE WHEN CC1.PCS_DT IS NULL THEN '미처리' ELSE '처리' END) AS WECC_PROCS_YN /*고객센터 처리여부*/ , CC1.PCS_DT /*고객센터 처리일자*/ , CC1.PCP_ID /*고객센터 처리자*/ , F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'WK_PRGS_STAT_CD', S2.WK_PRGS_STAT_CD, 'ko') AS WK_PRGS_STAT_NM /*작업진행상태*/ , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(S2.WK_EXCN_DT),'YYYY-MM-DD') AS WK_EXCN_DT /*처리일자*/ , S2.WK_PRTNR_OG_TP_CD /*작업처리자조직*/ , S2.WK_PRTNR_NO /*작업처리자번호*/ , O3.PRTNR_KNM AS WK_PRTNR_KNM /*작업처리자성명*/ , (CASE WHEN S3.SV_PROCS_FOM_CD IS NOT NULL THEN F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'PROCS_FOM_CD', S3.SV_PROCS_FOM_CD, 'ko') WHEN S2.WK_PRGS_STAT_CD IN ('71', '72') THEN ( CASE WHEN LENGTH(S2.WK_CAN_RSON_CD) = 2 THEN F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'SV_WK_CAN_RSON_CD', S2.WK_CAN_RSON_CD, 'ko') ELSE F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'RCP_CAN_RSON_CD', S2.WK_CAN_RSON_CD, 'ko') END ) ELSE '' END) AS WK_CAN_RSON_NM /*처리형태*/ , (CASE WHEN S3.SV_PROCS_CN IS NOT NULL THEN S3.SV_PROCS_CN WHEN S2.WK_PRGS_STAT_CD IN ('71', '72') THEN S2.WK_CAN_MO_CN ELSE '' END) AS WK_CAN_CN /*처리/취소내용*/ , ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY C4.DTL_CNTR_NO, C4.DTL_CNTR_SN ORDER BY C4.ADRPC_TP_CD DESC) AS ADRPC_TP_CD_RNK FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SVAS_IST_OJ_IZ S1 /*고객서비스AS설치대상내역, AC211TB*/ INNER JOIN TB_SVPD_CST_SVAS_IST_ASN_IZ S2 /*고객서비스수행배정내역, AC221TB*/ ON S2.CST_SV_ASN_NO = S1.CST_SV_ASN_NO AND S2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SVPD_CST_SV_WK_RS_IZ S3 /*고객서비스작업결과내역, VS106TB*/ ON S3.CST_SV_ASN_NO = S1.CST_SV_ASN_NO AND S3.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SVST_SV_WK_OSTR_IZ S4 /*서비스작업출고내역, ST163TB*/ ON S4.CST_SV_ASN_NO = S1.CST_SV_ASN_NO AND S4.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SVPD_AS_TP_CD S5 /*AS유형코드, CO460TB*/ ON S5.PD_CD = S1.PD_CD AND S5.SV_ANA_LCLSF_CD = S1.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN S5.APY_STRTDT AND S5.APY_ENDDT AND S5.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' INNER JOIN OG_PRTNR_WARE_INF O1 ON O1.OG_TP_CD = S1.RCP_OG_TP_CD AND O1.PRTNR_NO = S1.RCP_ICHR_PRTNR_NO INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_WELLS_DTL C1 /*계약WELLS상세*/ ON C1.CNTR_NO = S1.CNTR_NO AND C1.CNTR_SN = S1.CNTR_SN AND C1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_BAS C2 /*계약기본*/ ON C2.CNTR_NO = C1.CNTR_NO AND C2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_DTL C3 /*계약상세*/ ON C3.CNTR_NO = C1.CNTR_NO AND C3.CNTR_SN = C1.CNTR_SN AND C3.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_ADR_REL C4 /*계약주소관계*/ ON C4.DTL_CNTR_NO = C1.CNTR_NO AND C4.DTL_CNTR_SN = C1.CNTR_SN AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') BETWEEN C4.VL_STRT_DTM AND C4.VL_END_DTM AND C4.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_ADRPC_BAS C5 /*계약주소지기본*/ ON C5.CNTR_ADRPC_ID = C4.CNTR_ADRPC_ID AND C5.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_PD_REL C6 /*계약상품관계*/ ON C6.CNTR_NO = C1.CNTR_NO AND C6.CNTR_SN = C1.CNTR_SN AND C6.PD_REL_TP_CD = '05' /* 05 기준-제품 */ AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') || '000000' BETWEEN C6.VL_STRT_DTM AND C6.VL_END_DTM AND C6.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' /* (PD_REL_TP_CD) 01 복합-기준, 02 기준-기준, 03 기준-서비스, 04 서비스-서비스, 05 기준-제품, 06 대체품(Substitution), 07 상품-필터, 08 패키지(Package), 09 번들(Bundle), 10 프로모션상품-상품, 11 추가구매, 12 동시구매/기계약상품, 13 혼식불가, 14 AS부품, 15 대체모종, 16 멤버십기준상품, 17 구매 불가상품, 18 정기배송 제품명(BS), 19 동시구매선택상품, 20 동시구매선택번들상품, 21 패키지구성제품, 22 스마트체인지상품, 23 사은품, 24 BS투입제품, 25 구성품 */ INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_BAS P1 /*상품기본*/ ON P1.PD_CD = S1.PD_CD AND P1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN GBSDBS.TB_GBCO_ADR_BAS G1 ON G1.ADR_ID = S1.ADR_ID AND G1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN CCSDBS.TB_AS_REQUEST CC1 /*AS요청내역*/ ON CC1.AS_IST_OBJ_NO = S1.AS_IST_OJ_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OGBS_MM_PRTNR_IZ O2 /*월파트너내역*/ ON O2.BASE_YM = SUBSTR(CC1.PCS_DT,1,6) AND O2.PRTNR_NO = CC1.PCP_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OGBS_MM_PRTNR_IZ O3 /*월파트너내역*/ ON O3.BASE_YM = SUBSTR(S2.WK_EXCN_DT,1,6) AND O3.PRTNR_NO = S2.WK_PRTNR_NO WHERE 1=1 AND S1.IN_CHNL_DV_CD = '2' AND S1.RCPDT LIKE #{baseYm} || '%' /*기준연월 선택값*/
AND CC1.PCS_DT IS NOT NULL /*처리구분: 처리*/
AND CC1.PCS_DT IS NULL /*처리구분: 미처리*/
AND S1.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD LIKE #{rcpGb} || '%' /*접수구분*/
) V1 WHERE 1=1 AND ADRPC_TP_CD_RNK = '1' ORDER BY DGR1_LEVL_OG_CD , DGR2_LEVL_OG_CD , DGR3_LEVL_OG_CD , WK_EXCN_DT
